homePage.developmentDisclaimer: This website is currently in development and provided for demonstration purposes only. It is not intended for public use. Any data entered or actions taken on this site may not be secure, saved, or processed correctly. Use is at your own risk.
homePage.title: Share crypto
homePage.subtitle: Send or receive tokens & NFTs with just a link or QR code
homePage.feature1: No wallet setup or address sharing
homePage.feature2: Use for tips, invoice, airdrops & swaps
homePage.feature3: Lock with a password, NFT, or X

loginModal.title: Choose your wallet
loginModal.errorMessage: Failed to connect wallet. Please try again.

page.title: Cashier links
page.description: Start creating transaction links with Cashier: create & airdrop NFTs, and more features coming!

disconnectModal.title: Disconnect wallet
disconnectModal.description: Are you sure you want to disconnect your wallet? If you do, you will be logged out

chooseType.titlePlaceholder: Enter a title for your link
chooseType.titleRequired: Please enter a name for your link
chooseType.failedToProceed: Failed to proceed to next step

tokenBasket.title: Token basket
tokenBasket.description: Congratulations, you received a token basket!

addAsset.noTokensMatchingSearch: No tokens found matching your search.
addAsset.maxBalanceExceeded: Maximum available balance is {{max}} {{symbol}}. Amount adjusted to maximum.

errors.onlyOneAssetSupported: Only one asset is supported for tip links
errors.amountMustBeGreaterThanZero: Amount must be greater than zero to proceed
errors.insufficientBalance: Cannot create link: Need {{required}} {{tokenSymbol}}, but only have {{available}}.

txCart.title: Confirm transaction
txCart.termsAgreement: By confirming you agree execute the transaction above and agree to the terms of service

feeInfo.title: Fee Information
feeInfo.linkCreationFeeText: Cashier charges a modest fee for creating links. The fees help us operate and improve Cashier.
feeInfo.networkFeeText1: Network fees are charged by the blockchains, not by Cashier, as a payment to transfer assets on the blockchain. Cashier collects network fees to facilitate these transfer payments.
feeInfo.networkFeeText2: When an asset is sent to the link, network fee is charged. The amount may depend on the blockchain.
feeInfo.networkFeeText3: When an asset is received from the link, network fee is charged. Cashier pre-emptively collects these network fees from the link creator, so that the receiver does not have to pay a network fee to receive assets from the link.

assetTransferInfo.title: Info on asset transfer to link
assetTransferInfo.text1: Cashier will hold the assets in a vault, until someone claims them from the link you share.
assetTransferInfo.text2: You may end the link and withdraw the assets, if no-one claims the assets.

firstStep.text: Ending the link will deactivate the link page, and you will need not be able to retrieve the remaining assets.

secondStep.text: Are you sure you want to end the link? This action cannot be undone.

error.use_without_login_or_wallet: You need to login or input your wallet

congratulations.title: Congratulations!
congratulations.description: You've created a link. Copy the link address, and share it others.

errors.noActionTypeFound: No applicable action type found for this link
